title: Winnie the Pooh discovers the seasons
creator_credit: Ennis McNutty, Rick Reinert and Walt Disney
brief_description: Christopher Robin gives Winnie the Pooh a calendar to keep track of days and seasons. Winnie and his friends discover the joys of long, warm days and Winnie learns about hibernation from the Wise Owl. With songs and music.
creator_credit_for_label: Ennis McNutty, Rick Reinert and Walt Disney
